content: The postponement of certain projects, including promotional events and agricultural initiates, as well as lower business-related expenses during the first half of the quarter, temporarily affected our overall expenses. Since we introduced Duo grocery in the second half of 2020, we have also seen that in the areas of matching localized demand and localized supply as well as in the area of fulfillment, this service can provide our consumers with a fresher, more affordable and more convenient agriculture products, it can create tangible value for consumers.
